name: Huawei-nova
description: HUAWEI is pushing smartphone design to the limits with an even bigger screen-to-body ratio on the all-new HUAWEI nova 5T. By hiding the front camera beneath the screen, HUAWEI nova 5T’s screen retains its full integrity, revolutionizing user experience.

name: Realme-5 Pro
description: With F1.8 ultra large aperture and the half-inch sensor, realme 5 Pro can capture great nightscapes even in low-light condition. When you turn on the Super Nightscape mode, you can take stunning night shots, with the help of multi-frame engine and HDR.

name: Samsung-A12
description: Samsung Galaxy A12 comes with 6.5 inches PLS IPS HD+ screen. It has a Full-View waterdrop notch design. The back camera is of quad 48+5+2+2 MP with Autofocus, LED flash, depth sensor, dedicated macro camera etc. and Full HD video recording.

name: Walton-primo H9 Pro
description: Walton Primo H9 Pro comes with 6.1 inches HD+ IPS screen. It has a full-view handsome looking waterdrop notch design. The back camera is of triple 13+5+0.3 MP with PDAF, depth sensor, ultrawide, LED flash, f/2.0 aperture etc and Full HD video recording.

name: Oppo K1
description: The Oppo K1 features a plastic body with a 3D injection moulded back, which creates cool patterns against light. The 6.41-inch AMOLED lokking good  and display produces punchy and vivid colours and it also has a segment-first in-display and awesome fingerprint sensor.

name: Apple Ios 13
description: iOS 13 brings new capabilities to the apps you use every day, with rich updates to Photos and Maps, and privacy-protecting features like Sign In with Apple, all while delivering faster performance,” said Craig Federighi, Apple’s senior vice president of Software Engineering.
